data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Osrednjeslovenska to exponentially multiply disciples.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Osrednjeslovenska, Slovenia
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Please, convict the 1,187 believers in Osrednjeslovenska, Slovenia to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 480 lost neighbors

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 1,187 believers in Osrednjeslovenska, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the state of Osrednjeslovenska.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Domžale
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Domžale, Osrednjeslovenska, Slovenia.
Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 570,800 souls in Osrednjeslovenska and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Osrednjeslovenska to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 480 neighbors who are far from you in Osrednjeslovenska. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.
